name: Wildfire - Houdini Game Jam 2022
description:
As a lone wildflower imbued with an endless supply of water it's up to you to save your long hidden home from the evil wildfire that dares to swallow it whole.

This was a game fully built and made by me during the duration of Houdini Jam 2022 using Houdini, Substance Designer, Unity, and Audacity. The only things not by me are the sounds and music which were provided by https://www.weloveindies.com/en during the Jam.
